notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, A.G.N., O.R., K.D.H. and M.S.; chemical structures preparation, R.C. and M.S.; investigation, K.D.H., A.G.N., M.S. and O.R.; visualization, N.T., R.C. and S.L.; resources, N.T., S.L. and R.C.; data curation, A.G.N., O.R. and M.S.; writing—original draft preparation, A.G.N., O.R. and N.T.; writing—review and editing, K.D.H., M.S. and O.R. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
